txt_en: Never eat more than you can lift.
txt_cn: 吃的永远不要比能拿的多。
author: Miss Piggy

txt_en: Nothing is impossible. Some things are just less likely than others.
txt_cn: 没有什么是不可能的，只是有些事可能性比其他的小一点而已。
author: Jonathan Winters

txt_en: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
txt_cn: 自信是成大事的首要条件。
author: Samuel Johnson

txt_en: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
txt_cn: 教育的目的是使空洞的大脑变得开放宽广。
author: Malcolm Forbes

txt_en: Life wouldn't be worth living if I worried over the future as well as the present.
txt_cn: 如果我既担忧未来又担忧现在，那么这样的生活不值得我去过。
author: W. Somerset Maugham

txt_en: I often quote myself. It adds spice to my conversation.
txt_cn: 我常常引用自己的话，它可以为我的谈话增添点色彩。
author: George Bernard Shaw
